apps.name: notes-app
apps.description: Simple note-taking assistant with CRUD operations and markdown support.

tools.name: notes:save
tools.description: Create or update a note with id, title, and content

tools.name: notes:list
tools.description: List all notes for the current user

tools.name: notes:read
tools.description: Read a note by ID

tools.name: notes:delete
tools.description: Delete a note by ID

apps.name: watch-recommender
apps.description: AI-powered movie & TV recommendations with watch history, taste profiling, and streaming availability via TMDB.

tools.name: watch-log
tools.description: Log a movie or TV show as watched, or list your watch history

tools.name: watch-dismiss
tools.description: Dismiss a title so it is never recommended again

tools.name: watch-preference
tools.description: Manage viewing preferences and streaming subscriptions

tools.name: watch-profile
tools.description: Manage your taste profile — view, generate, or save

tools.name: watch-recommend
tools.description: Get personalized viewing recommendations based on mood and taste

tools.name: watch-check
tools.description: Check if titles are already watched, dismissed, or queued

tools.name: watch-lookup
tools.description: Look up a title on TMDB for metadata and streaming availability

tools.name: watch-onboard
tools.description: Interactive onboarding and taste discovery

tools.name: watch-queue
tools.description: Manage your watchlist — save, list, remove, update priorities

tools.name: watch-seen-bulk
tools.description: Bulk-store slim seen entries for dedup (admin dashboard)

tools.name: watch-screen
tools.description: Second screen companion — cast, crew, trivia for what you're watching

tools.name: watch-settings
tools.description: View or update settings (e.g., personal TMDB API key)

tools.name: watch-feedback
tools.description: Submit feedback, view threads, or manage feedback (admin)

apps.name: travel-planner
apps.description: Personal trip planning assistant with nested stops for organizing multi-destination trips.

tools.name: trip:create
tools.description: Create a new trip

tools.name: trip:add_stop
tools.description: Add a stop to an existing trip

tools.name: trip:list
tools.description: List all trips for the current user

tools.name: trip:get
tools.description: Get full trip details including all stops

tools.name: trip:delete
tools.description: Delete a trip and all its stops

apps.name: local-guide
apps.description: Discover nearby places with a shared catalog and personal favorites using geohash-based search.

tools.name: guide:search_nearby
tools.description: Search for places near a location using geohash buckets

tools.name: guide:get_details
tools.description: Get full details for a place by ID

tools.name: guide:save_favorite
tools.description: Save a place to your favorites

tools.name: guide:list_favorites
tools.description: List your saved favorite places

apps.name: bbq-smoking
apps.description: BBQ smoking assistant — tracks cooks, logs temps, saves recipes, and provides pitmaster guidance.

tools.name: bbq-start_cook
tools.description: Start a new BBQ cook/smoke session with meat type, weight, temps, wood

tools.name: bbq-get_cook
tools.description: Get full details of a cook session including all log entries

tools.name: bbq-list_cooks
tools.description: List all cook sessions — active and completed

tools.name: bbq-complete_cook
tools.description: Mark a cook session as completed with final notes

tools.name: bbq-add_log
tools.description: Log an event during a cook: temp check, wrap, spritz, add wood, etc.

tools.name: bbq-save_recipe
tools.description: Save a BBQ smoking recipe with steps, wood type, temps, and tips

tools.name: bbq-get_recipe
tools.description: Get full recipe details including steps and tips

tools.name: bbq-list_recipes
tools.description: List all saved BBQ recipes

tools.name: bbq-update_recipe
tools.description: Update an existing recipe (partial update supported)

tools.name: bbq-smoking_guide
tools.description: Look up smoking guidelines for a specific meat: temps, times, wood pairings
